dashboard.lastDonation: Your last donation was made on

dashboard.notMadeDonation: I did not made the donation

addAppointments.emergencyDonationInEmail: There is a patient in need of an emergency donation in
addAppointments.contactCoordEmail: and according to our data you are a suitable donor. Please contact [Coordinator name] in [Coordinator phone number] immediately if you can come for a donation today or in the coming days
addAppointments.emergencyDonationInSMS: There is a patient in need of an emergency donation in
addAppointments.contactCoordSMS: and according to our data you are a suitable donor. Please contact [Coordinator name] in [Coordinator phone number] immediately if you can come for a donation today or in the coming days
addAppointments.thanksForSupport: Thank You for continuing to support us

bookTaxi.rideBack: I need a ride back to
bookTaxi.taxiConfirm: Your taxi has been confirmed for
bookTaxi.editOrCancelPhrase: If you have any issues on the day, or wish to edit or cancel your ride,  please contact your coordinator

forgotPassword.enterEmailPhrase: Please enter your email address below and an email will with your information will be sent to it.
forgotPassword.emailSentPhrase: An Email was send to the address you provided us with!
forgotPassword.checkEmailPhrase: Please check your email and try to login again

loginForm.notSignedUp: Not signed up as donor yet?

notificationOptions.contactPreferencesPhrase: Please select all methods you are happy to be contacted by

registerForm.contactingPhrase: contacting you in case of an emergency can save lives. Are you sure you don’t want to be alerted?

questionnaire.questionnaireSpan: In order to make sure that you fit. Please complete the questionnaire
questionnaire.q_blood_or_thrombocytes: Have you ever donated blood or Thrombocytes?
questionnaire.q_tattoo_earrings_piercing: Did you do a tattoo/earrings/piercing in the last 6 months?
questionnaire.q_diabetes_option_yes_stable: Yes, but stable treated by medicines
questionnaire.q_diabetes_option_yes_not_stable: Yes, but not stable or treated with Insulin
questionnaire.q_aboard: Have you been abroad in the last year?
questionnaire.q_surgery: Have you gone through a medical surgery in the last month?
questionnaire.q_chronic_disease: Do you suffer from a chronic disease?
questionnaire.q_cancer: Have you ever suffered from cancer?
questionnaire.q_antibiotics: Did you take antibiotics in the last 3 days?
questionnaire.q_dentist_procedure: Have you gone through Dentist procedure in the last 10 days?
questionnaire.q_open_wound_or_scratch: Do you have an open wound or a scratch?
questionnaire.q_age: Do you confirm your age is between 17 and 65?
questionnaire.q_age_ichilov: Do you confirm your age is between 18 and 62?
questionnaire.q_pregnant_beilinsohn: Have you been pregnant in the last 6 months?
questionnaire.q_last_donation_less_month_more_10_days: Less than one month, more than 10 days ago
questionnaire.error_blood_or_thrombocytes: Sorry, according to Beilinsohn rules, you can only donate if you already previously donated. Please try to donate in another Hospital
questionnaire.error_weight: Sorry, according to the Hospital rules, you can only donate if your weight is above 50kg. Please contact your Coordinator for details
questionnaire.error_weight_ichilov: Sorry, according to Ichilov rules, you can only donate if your weight is above 55kg. If your weight is above 50kg, please try to donate in another Hospital
questionnaire.error_tattoo_earrings_piercing: Sorry, according to the Hospital rules, you can only donate if there have passed more than 6 months since such procedure accured. Please try to donate when the time would pass
questionnaire.error_diabetes: Sorry, according to the Hospital rules, the donation can't take place. Please contact your Coordinator for information
questionnaire.error_medicines: Sorry, according to the Hospital rules, the donation can't take place. Please contact your Coordinator for information
questionnaire.error_aboard: Sorry, according to the Hospital rules, the donation can't take place. Please contact your Coordinator for information
questionnaire.error_surgery: Sorry, according to the Hospital rules, the donation can't take place. Please try to donate at least 1 month after the medical surgery took place
questionnaire.error_chronic_disease: Sorry, according to the Hospital rules, the donation can't take place. Please contact your Coordinator for information
questionnaire.error_cancer: Sorry, according to the Hospital rules, the donation can't take place. Please contact your Coordinator for information
questionnaire.error_antibiotics: Sorry, according to the Hospital rules, the donation can't take place. Please try to donate at least 3 days after finishing taking the Antibiotics
questionnaire.error_dentist_procedure: Sorry, according to the Hospital rules, the donation can't take place. Please try to donate at least 10 days after the Dentist procedure took place
questionnaire.error_open_wound_or_scratch: Sorry, according to the Hospital rules, the donation can't take place. Please try to donate after the wound or the scratch would heal
questionnaire.error_age: Sorry, according to the Hospital rules, the donation can't take place. Please contact your Coordinator for information
questionnaire.error_age_ichilov: Sorry, according to Ichilov rules, you can only donate if your age is between 18-62. If your age is between 17-65, please try to donate in another Hospital
questionnaire.error_pregnant: Sorry, according to the Hospital rules, the donation can't take place. Please try to donate at least 6 months after finishing the pregnant
questionnaire.error_pregnant_beilinsohn: Sorry, according to the Hospital rules, the donation can't take place. If you at least 6 months after finishing the pregnant, please try to donate in another Hospital
questionnaire.error_last_donation_beilinsohn: Sorry, according to Beilinsohn rules, you can only donate if you already previously donated. Please try to donate in another Hospital
questionnaire.error_last_donation_general: Sorry, it is not possible to donate if your previous donation was less than a month ago

verificationList.eatSome: Eat some fruit/snack (but not a fatty one)
verificationList.needARide: Need a ride for your visit to the hospital

onAirDonations.sureDeleteAppointment: Are you sure you want to delete this appointment
